metadata.description: How much overlap you have in hobbies, passions, and what you geek out about
metadata.sentence_template: For shared interests, you two are ___.

astrological_basis.what_it_measures: Mercury shows intellectual interests. Venus shows aesthetic and social preferences. Jupiter shows what excites and expands you.

planet_meanings.Jupiter: what excites you and where you seek growth

very_low.label: Separate Worlds
very_low.guidance: Live in different universes; more occasional than daily.

low.label: Parallel
low.guidance: Some overlap, mostly different lanes; curiosity about hobbies.

mid.label: Crossroads
mid.guidance: Enough shared ground to build on.

high.label: In Sync
high.guidance: Plenty in common; good for frequent plans.

very_high.label: Same Obsession
very_high.guidance: Deep overlap; great for geeking out together.
